InstallationÂ¶

Downloads, installation instructions, installation dependencies and the source code are all available from the cf-python home page (http://cfpython.bitbucket.org).

Installation instructions and hardware and software dependencies are detailed in the README.md file (https://bitbucket.org/cfpython/cf-python), which is also contained with the downloaded source code.

Please raise any questions or problems through the cf-python issue tracker (https://bitbucket.org/cfpython/cf-python/issues, you will need an account with Bitbucket to post).
